backend/main.mo: Main backend canister combining storage and authorization, managing user profiles, posts, comments, and permissions with username uniqueness and suspension checks.
backend/migration.mo: Migration logic converting old posts and comments to new structures by adding likedBy sets while preserving existing data.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata file documenting feature evidence for UI handling of duplicate-like errors linked to specific frontend files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files describing their roles across auth, feed, moderation, polls, notifications, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and applying base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app with metadata, icons, and manifest references.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, icons, colors, and display configuration.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing authentication, profile bootstrap watchdog, error handling, navigation, and page rendering.
frontend/src/components/auth/BootstrapEr: Error screen component showing user-friendly bootstrap and network error messages with retry and logout actions.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginScreen: Login screen using Internet Identity with styled sign-in UI and loading state.
frontend/src/components/feed/CommentsThr: Renders a post’s comment thread with posting, liking, deleting, and reporting comments, including suspension checks and validation.
frontend/src/components/feed/DeleteComme: Confirmation dialog for deleting a comment, triggering delete mutation and showing toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/feed/DeletePostD: Confirmation dialog for deleting a post and its comments, using a delete mutation with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/feed/PostCard.ts: Displays a post with author info, content, actions, image handling, like button, and menus for reporting or deleting.
Main app layout with header, sharing, notifications badge, page content area, and bottom navigation.
frontend/src/components/nav/BottomNav.ts: Bottom navigation bar allowing page switching with icons for feed, posting, polls, and profile.
frontend/src/components/polls/WeeklyPoll: Weekly poll UI handling voting states, topic selection, and result display with compact and full layouts.
frontend/src/components/profile/Username: Modal for setting a unique username with validation and mutation submission.
frontend/src/components/reporting/Report: Dialog to report a user account, triggering a mutation and showing success or error toasts.
Dialog for reporting a comment, calling a mutation, removing it from the feed, and adding a local notification.
Dialog to report a post, invoking a mutation, removing it from the feed, and adding a local notification.
frontend/src/constants/uploads.ts: Defines allowed image MIME types and a 5MB maximum upload size.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context with login, logout, and stored identity handling using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, posts, and other backend data with timeout logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useSuspensionStatus.t: Derives whether the current user is suspended based on their profile’s suspension timestamp.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color variables, dark mode, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
Lists banned terms and provides normalization and detection helpers for moderation.
frontend/src/moderation/validateTextCont: Validates text content for emptiness and disallowed terms.
frontend/src/moderation/validateUsername: Validates usernames for length, character rules, and disallowed content.
frontend/src/notifications/localNotifica: Manages notification storage in localStorage, including retrieval, creation, marking read, and unread counts.
frontend/src/notifications/notificationT: Defines notification types and the Notification interface.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: UI for creating posts with text and optional images, including validation, upload progress, and suspension checks.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Fetches and displays the main post feed with refresh control and weekly poll panel.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Displays user notifications with icons and marks items as read when clicked.
frontend/src/pages/PollsPage.tsx: Shows the weekly poll panel page.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays user profile info, suspension status, sharing options, and logout.
frontend/src/polls/extractWeeklyTopics.t: Extracts top topics from weekly post/comment text using normalization, stop-word removal, and frequency sorting.
frontend/src/polls/localPollStore.ts: Stores weekly poll data in localStorage, handles creation, retrieval, and voting with week-based resets.
frontend/src/polls/pollTimeWindow.ts: Determines poll week IDs and current poll state based on weekday rules.
frontend/src/polls/useWeeklyPoll.ts: React hook managing weekly poll lifecycle, topic extraction, voting, and poll availability notifications.
frontend/src/utils/imageFileValidation.t: Validates image file type and size against allowed formats and max size constants.
frontend/src/utils/shareHornetHive.ts: Provides sharing utilities using Web Share API with clipboard and legacy fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/timeFormat.ts: Formats timestamps into relative time strings and readable suspension end dates.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Retrieves, stores, and clears URL and session parameters with support for hash routing.
frontend/src/utils/withTimeout.ts: Wraps a promise with a timeout that rejects if it does not resolve in time.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, architectural notes, and feature requests for preventing duplicate comment likes.
